target.name: current.deploy_no_wait
target.depends: check.version, current.deploy_tools, current.check_version, current.stop, current.deploy_artifacts, current.clear_logs, current.start, current.install_send

sshexec.command: cd; pwd | perl -ne 'chomp; print $_'
echo mkdir -v -p ${current.home_folder}/${deploy.folder}
perl ${current.home_folder}/${file.get_build} --version=${version} --module=${module.test}
for module in ${current.services} ; do echo stop [$module]; sudo /etc/init.d/$module stop ; done

cd /home/sites/artifacts; for module in ${current.artifacts} ; do sudo perl ${current.home_folder}/${file.get_build} --version=${version} --auto-save-as-symlink --module=$module --delete-current-symlink-target ; done
for log_file in ${current.logs} ; do if [ -f $log_file ]; then sudo rm -v $log_file ; fi ; done

pushd $PWD && dir=$( mktemp -d ) && cd $dir && unzip /home/sites/artifacts/send.jar && cd package-send && ant install -Dsesame.server=Development -DpersistSchema=${persistSchema} -DpersistHost=${persistHost} -DpersistPort=${persistPort} -DpersistUser=${persistUser} -DpersistPassword=${persistPassword} -DsendSupportEmail=error_report@sesamecommunications.com -DsendConfigTemplate=production.conf.template && popd && rm -rf $dir
for module in ${current.services} ; do echo start [$module]; sudo /etc/init.d/$module start ; done

perl -mstrict -e 'do { for (@ARGV) { if (qx(fgrep SERVICE $_) !~ m{SERVICE STARTED}) { printf qq(waiting [%s] (%s)\n), $_, scalar localtime ; sleep ${wait.check_every}; redo } } } while (0); print qq(Waiting is complete\n)' ${current.logs_wait}
